# [Interview #515: JordanCon: Interview with Alan Romanczuk by Richard Fife, Entry #9](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=515#9)

#### Richard Fife

Well, at least it wasn't a RAFO. But, without saying RAFO, who killed Asmodean?

#### Alan Romanczuk

Is he dead?

#### Richard Fife

Oh . . . apparently not.
